p: The sources included met the following criteria: the full-texts of published or unpublished literature, written in English, Spanish or Portuguese, with no time frame. The search was conducted in April 2020 and included studies addressing maternal and neonatal variables during the childbirth, postpartum and neonatal periods in the context of the new coronavirus. Studies addressing the gestational period and prenatal care were excluded, along with papers that did not provide direct recommendations for the care provided to parturient and puerperal women and newborns.
